name: everything

A2 all things: You can't blame him for everything.anything and everything He's obsessed with Britney Spears and collects anything and everything connected with her.in spite of everything Jane's been unfaithful to Jim three times, but he still loves her in spite of everything. Money isn't everything (= the most important thing).everything to His children are everything to him (= the most important part of his life). Have you been crying? Is everything all right? The thieves took everything. We did everything we could to save her but she died.everything necessary We shall do everything necessary to bring the murderer to justice. They're very busy with their new house and everything (= all the things connected with it).
